clientId.label: Client-ID
clientId.helpText: The REST-API Client-ID that is being used to authenticate this plugin to the PayPal API.

clientSecret.label: Client-Secret
clientSecret.helpText: The REST-API Client-Secret that is being used to authenticate this plugin to the PayPal API.

submitCart.label: Submit cart
submitCart.helpText: If this option is active, the cart will be submitted to PayPal.

brandName.label: Brand name on the PayPal page
brandName.helpText: This text will be displayed as the brand name on the PayPal payment page.

helpText.Login: Login: The PayPal site displays a login screen as landingpage.
helpText.Billing: Registration: The PayPal site displays a registration form as landingpage.

settingForm.messageSaveSuccess: The PayPal settings have been saved successfully.
settingForm.messageTestSuccess: The API credentials have been successfully validated.
settingForm.messageTestError: The API credentials could not been validated.
settingForm.messageWebhookCreated: The webhook has been successfully registered.
settingForm.messageWebhookUpdated: The webhook has been successfully updated.
settingForm.messageWebhookError: The webhook could not be saved. Following errors occurred:
